pkgmetadata.longdescription: Penalized Regression Models with Overlapping Grouped Covariates // Fit the regularization path of linear, logistic or Cox models with overlapping grouped covariates based on the latent group lasso approach. Latent group MCP/SCAD as well as bi-level selection methods, namely the group exponential lasso and the composite MCP are also available. This package serves as an extension of R package 'grpreg' (by Dr. Patrick Breheny patrick-breheny@uiowa.edu) for grouped variable selection involving overlaps between groups.
